'''Cam Miller''' was a patient at [[Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital]] who was in a car accident.

==History==
Cam was unrestrained in a vehicle when it was T-boned. He was brought in stable with a GCS of 14. He was covered in gasoline from the tanker leak. Despite this, he wanted to go outside to get a cigarette. Since his injuries were minor, he was quickly treated and released. However, he was re-admitted when he smoked just outside the hospital, causing him to burst into flames. He also managed to snap his elbow. He was taken into surgery directly from the ER.
